channel.title: 2 Rooms 1 Boom TOL edition CHAOS LIST!
channel.description:
**Two Rooms and A Boom: ToL edition!**
## Rules:
You may not privately communicate with people not in your room, and all communications must go through me in some way. Other than that, anything goes! I will however announce who is communicating with who in your server. Please don’t be a jerkface. Always play to your eventual win. This is important, as intentionally changing teams can be allowed with more complicated roles. Have fun!
## The Game: The game is based around two main teams: the Red Team and the Blue Team. On the Red Team, there is a Bomber, on the Blue Team there is a President. All players will be split into two rooms,which will be represented by Discord Servers. Every round a number of players will be chosen to be sent to the other room.
At the end of the game, the Blue Team wins if the President and Bomber are in separate rooms, while the Red Team win if they are in the same room. However, in this particular game both teams will have an additional win condition: The President must card share with the Doctor by the end of the game to cure their illness, and the Bomber must card share with the Engineer to arm the bomb.
In additon, there are roles which are on neither team, they are on Grey Team. Details will be given below. ## Electing a GLORIOUS LEADER At the start of the game, a random player in either room will be chosen as OUR GLORIOUS LEADER for that room.
At any time, a player may attempt to Usurp a leader, by doing /nominate [new leader]. Should the majority of other players in the room do /approve, the leader will be replaced. At any time, a Leader may give their leadership away to another player. At the end of each round, the Leader must have chosen players to send to the other room, or else RNG will pick.
## Color/Card sharing. During each round, players may do /card share [Player] or /color share [player. If the other player /accepts, both will show each other either their full rolecard or just the team they are on. You may also /card reveal [player] or /color reveal [player] to simply reveal your card to them.
Finally, you may /public card reveal or /public color reveal to reveal your card/color to absoloutely everyone else in the room.
## Rounds: Each round the Leader of each room will send Hostages to the other room
* Round 1 - 4 Hostages and 4 days to chose * Round 2 - 3 Hostages and 3 days to chose * Round 3 - 2 Hostages and 2 days to chose * Round 4 - 2 Hostages and 1 day to chose * Round 5 - 1 Hostage and 1 day to chose
## Role List: [color=#0080FF]**President**[/color] [color=#0080FF]**Doctor**[/color] [color=#0080FF]**Blue Spy**[/color] [color=#0080FF]**Identity thief**[/color] [color=#0080FF]**Immunologist**[/color] [color=#0080FF]**Psychologist**[/color] [color=#0080FF]**Thug**[/color] [color=#FF0000]**Bomber**[/color] [color=#FF0000]**Engineer**[/color] [color=#FF0000]**Red Spy**[/color] [color=#FF0000]**Identity thief**[/color] [color=#FF0000]**Immunologist**[/color] [color=#FF0000]**Psychologist**[/color] [color=#FF0000]**Thug**[/color] [color=grey]**Hot potato**[/color] [color=grey]**M16**[/color]
I don't think mass sharing will be a problem.
----------
Immunologist - you are immune to all conditions and powers
Identity thief - When you card share with someone you swap cards with them. They get the Shy condition preventing them from showing their card or color.
Thug - Anyone you card share with becomes Coy and can only show color
Psychologist V2.0 - When you Private reveal your card to someone you remove Shy or Coy from them. You cannot receive Coy or Shy.
Hot potato - Whenever you card or color share with someone you swap cards with them. The hot potato loses at the end of the game.
M16 - You win if you have card shared the president and the bomber
**Note: cards that require you to card share with someone need you to do it with whoever had it last. If they got their card swapped you need to do it again.**
**Swapping cards also removes all of its conditions.**
## Signups: 1: Strangler 2: Simon 3: AfterTech 4: Icibalus 5: PKR 6: Braixen 7: PolikShadowbliss 8: Hippolytus 9: Eevee 10: Nozbugz 11: Pug 12: KyoDaz 13: Insanity 14: Joshnniuq 15: ISWThunder 16: Brandon

item.title: 2 Rooms 1 Boom TOL edition CHAOS LIST!
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Con man and criminal being easily outed isn’t a huge deal because the enforcer and agent exist. The con man has the advantage of not messing up his team and being able to secretly cardshare with teammates. The criminal can work with the enforcer to force shares. The Eris using their power on the bomb and pres is the whole point and is practically converting him(ID thief can clear it btw)

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Rooms 1 Boom TOL edition CHAOS LIST!
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Neutral that turns people into Greys?

Psychic - Neutral

Warp someone’s mind, convincing them to join you if you card share with them.

Turn 50% of all people into Servants. The Doctor, Engineer, Bomber, Psychiatrist & President are immune to becoming Servants. You automatically win and all team loses except the Servant. You are immune to Coy, Shy and all other Negative effects.

Servant - Neutral

Make sure the Psychic wins.

Read full topic
item.source: 2 Rooms 1 Boom TOL edition CHAOS LIST!

Go for Mastermind V2 / Minion. That’d be fine.

Read full topic
item.source: 2 Rooms 1 Boom TOL edition CHAOS LIST!

item.title: 2 Rooms 1 Boom TOL edition CHAOS LIST!
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Agent seems balanced.
Con Man seems like the other player should only learn your Colour but the Con Man learns their Card. It would be too easy to confirm to the other team (much like I have outed you-know who in the game we are currently in)
Detective seems very useful.
Eris needs balancing. What if you reveal to the President and Bomber? What will happen then? Also, does their alignment get changed? If so, Bomber, President, Doctor and Engineer should be immune to Eris.
Dealer could be very, very powerful and useful. (Much like detective).
Criminal isn’t very good for the same reason as Con Man. (Very easily outed)
Enforcer seems balanced.

Read full topic
item.source: 2 Rooms 1 Boom TOL edition CHAOS LIST!

As the Decoy, you have a 1/15 chance of WINNING

Decoy is way too Underpowered compared to Target.
